ratings.comment: Dr. Goldstein was amazing for GWS103 made content super easy to understand and provided clear instructions for all assignments 10/10 class.

Prof. Goldstein is very caring and fun to learn from! Her GWS 103 course is very easy, yet super interesting with plenty of opportunities to learn more (such as optional readings) if you're interested in the content. Highly recommend both the course and professor!

Great professor, understanding and respectful. I took her for Gen&WS 103, and it was a super easy class. Tons of extra credit opportunities, but I didn't need them. 3 skips for discussion, but light workload with weekly quizzes. 4 papers make up 40% of your grade, but easy graders.

I have taken multiple courses with Professor Goldstein, she's truly an amazing professor. She is very understanding and her classes and lectures are all very interesting! Attendance is mandatory, and there are 3 main assignments in this class + weekly online quizzes. There is a choice of a final or a final project. Cannot recommend enough!
